newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Australia names new envoy to Phnom Penh.
newsitem.headline: Australia names new envoy to Phnom Penh.

text.p: Australian Foreign Minister Alexander Downer on Tuesday named career diplomat Malcolm Leader as Canberra's new ambassador to Cambodia.
Leader will replace Tony Kevin, whose three-year term as ambassador has ended.

Leader has worked with the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade for 26 years, serving in Noumea, Paris and Saudi Arabia before taking up his current position of assistant secretary of the department's resource branch in 1994. He will begin his term in September.
